title: Google\Cloud\Vision\Annotation\Face\Landmarks
name: Landmarks
description:
Describes landmarks on a face (eyes, nose, chin, etc).

Extends Google\Cloud\Vision\Annotation\AbstractFeature

methods.name: __construct
methods.description:
Create a landmarks results object.

This class should not be instantiated directly. It is created internally by the Cloud Vision service wrapper to represent FACE_DETECTION annotation results and provide helpful convenience to users.

methods.name: leftEyeBoundaries
methods.description:
Fetch the left eye boundaries.

This method returns an array with four keys: left, right, top, bottom. The value of each of these keys is of the normal Position format described in the Cloud Vision documentation.

methods.name: leftEyebrow
methods.description:
Fetch the left eyebrow position.

This method returns an array with three keys: left, right, upperMidpoint. The value of each of these keys is of the normal Position format described in the Cloud Vision documentation.

methods.name: rightEyeBoundaries
methods.description:
Fetch the right eye boundaries.

This method returns an array with four keys: left, right, top, bottom. The value of each of these keys is of the normal Position format described in the Cloud Vision documentation.

methods.name: rightEyebrow
methods.description:
Fetch the right eyebrow position.

This method returns an array with three keys: left, right, upperMidpoint. The value of each of these keys is of the normal Position format described in the Cloud Vision documentation.

methods.name: midpointBetweenEyes
methods.description: Get the position of the midpoint beteeen the eyes.

methods.name: lips
methods.description:
Get the position of the lips.

This method returns an array with two keys: upper and lower. The value of each of these keys is of the normal Position format described in the Cloud Vision documentation.

methods.name: mouth
methods.description:
Get the position of the mouth.

This method returns an array with three keys: left, right, center. The value of each of these keys is of the normal Position format described in the Cloud Vision documentation.

methods.name: nose
methods.description:
Get the position of the nose.

This method returns an array with four keys: tip, bottomRight, bottomLeft, bottomCenter. The value of each of these keys is of the normal Position format described in the Cloud Vision documentation.

methods.name: ears
methods.description:
Get the position of the ears.

This method returns an array with two keys: left and right. The value of each of these keys is of the normal Position format described in the Cloud Vision documentation.

methods.name: forehead
methods.description: Get the position of the forehead glabella.

methods.name: chin
methods.description:
Get the position of the chin.

This method returns an array with three keys: left, right, gnathion. The value of each of these keys is of the normal Position format described in the Cloud Vision documentation.
